item.description:
Happy Halloween Everyone!

AND, here is the Connor's Farm website with the regular prices detailed:
http://connorsfarm.ticketleap.com/fun-on-the-farm/

The Living Social Deal:
https://www.livingsocial.com/deals/452658?ref=conf-jp&rpi=83378730

The Connor's Farm admission is after 6pm, we will ride at 2pm. There are food vendors at the farm so we can eat later.

Please indicated on your rsvp if you purchased the LS deal. I purchased it already.

The website indicates that if it rains on that day they will post the cancellation on their website.

Directions To Connor's Farm-

-From the South - Boston
• Take Rte 1 north to north St. in Danvers. Take a right, follow to end and take a left. We are 1 mile down on the left.
• Take Rte 1 north or 128 North to Rte 95 north. Get off at exit 50 and stay to the right. Take a right onto North St. and follow to the end. Take a left. We are 1 mile down on the left.
• Take 93 North to 128 North. Get off at exit 23N. This is rte 35 north. We are 5 miles away from the off ramp on rte 35 on the left.

-From the North
• Take 95 South to Rte 97 south in Topsfield. Follow 97 South to Rte 35 south. We are ½ mile on the right in Danvers.
• Take Rte 1 South to Rte 97 south in Topsfield. Follow 97 South to Rte 35 south. We are ½ mile on the right in Danvers.

-From the West
• Take Rte 62 East to Rte 35 North (take a left). We are 3 miles down on the left.

-From the East
• Take Rte 62 West to Rte. 35 North (take a right). We are 3 miles down on the left.
item.name: Connors Farm after the Independence
